name: Branching. Operators if, else, else if

0.name: The if, else, else if operators allow you to change the behavior of a program depending on the conditions

1.name: The if statement must always be paired with the else statement

2.name: The else if statement allows you to check several conditions

3.name: You can use several nested if statements

4.name: If any condition is true as a result of an if statement, the other conditions will not be checked

5.name: The else operator can be used without the if operator

6.name: Inside the if statements you can use return

2.name: Yes. Only if the code is inside a function

7.name: You can use the if statement in a function to return different values depending on the condition

8.name: If the function has reached return, it terminates, even if there is more code after return

9.name: What the code will print if(true){console.log(false)} else {console.log(true)}
